body.p: Some features are labeled as experimental. Such features are provided on an "as-is" basis and are not formally supported. However, feedback and suggestions about such features are welcome. A comprehensive list of experimental features is as follows:

li.p: Hardware 3D acceleration support for Windows, Linux, and Oracle Solaris guests
Hardware 2D video playback acceleration support for Windows guests
Mac OS X guests (macOS hosts only)
Support of iSCSI using internal networking
Using and Hyper-V on the same host
